fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Many Conversion**
-After converting two people, you may convert two people instead of one.
-After converting four people, upon use of your ability, you convert random people until your faction hits the ref cap.
**Killing Locusts**
-After converting two people, you instead kill people instead of converting them.
-After killing two people, you may kill four people in one night.
â€”
You may only choose one upgrade path, outlined in bold.
You bypass conversion immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
